1.name: SENKO
1.description: A lightweight and user friendly point of sale system with many tools and features. Created using: html, css, js, bootstrap, and jquery. With QR code scanner support and ticket of sales generation.

2.name: Ecommerce Site
2.description: Reliable and user friendly ecommerce site, using html, css, and js, storing data in local storage

3.name: Image manipulation project
3.description: This is a compact image editor, this allows us to upload an image and eidt it then save it to local storage for fully free

4.name: DHantoV Airline website
4.description: You can track your flight with this website, or booking online. It's fully responsive. Created with html, css and js.

5.name: United States States
5.description: A simple game made with tkinter and pandas. Just write the name of the state you know then the game will tell you if it's correct or not

6.name: Learn a Language
6.description: A simple and powerfull tool to learn french or another language. Using an advvanced algorithm that increases your chances to learn and reduces the time to memorize.
